modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cmofl: Allow to specify which categories in Music & Sounds to mute or change the volume when the Minecraft window loses focus
cmofl.config.title: Configurable Mute On Focus Lost Config
cmofl.config.sound_categories.tooltip: Configure what volume each sound category is set to when MC loses focus. Set the category's volume to Off if you don't want it to be modified at all
cmofl.config.muteallsounds.tooltip: Should the mod ignore Sound Categories and instead mute all sounds?
cmofl.config.exception.default: Resetting config to default as a fix.
cmofl.config.exception.create: An exception was been thrown while trying to create the config:
cmofl.config.exception.save: An exception was been thrown while trying to save the config:
cmofl.config.exception.load: An exception was been thrown while trying to load the config:
